document.full_text: procter & gamble is changing how it makes its pampers cruisers and removing the words "dry max" from the package, a year after a highly-touted diaper revamp led to consumer complaints of blistered baby bottoms.
document.title: exclusive: pampers cruisers tweaked again after 2010 overhaul
lines_and_colors: procter & gamble is changing how it makes its pampers cruisers and removing the words "dry max" from the package, a year after a highly-touted diaper revamp led to consumer complaints of blistered baby bottoms.
